game_description: Channel Player has two scenes. - Playback title selection screen at Spacecraft theater. Display other titles with the left and right sticks and triggers. In the case of a folder or comic book (zip, cbz) where only still images are saved, they will be displayed in the same way as the folder where videos are saved. No need to sort the contents by name or by time, they will be listed in advance. It also has a favorite, history function, and unplayed title display function. - During playback at outer space. You can intuitively adjust the movement of the camera viewpoint during video playback with the left and right sticks. The AB button is used to start and end playback, and the trigger is to change the playback position, so it can be operated with a single action. You don't have to point the laser at a small button on the screen to operate the app. During video playback, there is a direct jump and a setting option that allows you to move the camera only during pauses.
